main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Portales, New Mexico on January 9, 1959.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2 minutes,The weather was clear and calm,One object displaying characteristics of a large motor was reported, The object was checked against various possibilities including balloon and aircraft but remained unidentified, The sighting involved multiple observers who reported consistent information.
sighted object: one unidentified object with characteristics of a large motor
witness description: Military personnel including pilots with significant flying experience.
